response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, and we are eager to share its benefits with you. We understand the importance of making this decision, and therefore, we propose a price that reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity it presents. Our offer is $950,000. We believe this price not only secures a fair return for us but also allows you to experience the unparalleled value of our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
